About.title: Jonathan Valentine
About.text: Jonathan Valentine was a biologist with the US Fish & Wildlife Service at Pelican Island National Wildlife Refuge before founding American Boneyard and Dig Through Time. Jonathan is a recent graduate from USF and previously served as the President for USFâ€™s Geology Club for two years. His past research before joining the refuge system concerned conservational paleo-biology and topics revolving around anthropogenic influences and socio-ecology.
